body:
### Summary

_This page is under construction, go to [sameeransari.info](http://sameeransari.info)_

Robotics engineer with work experience building hardware/software systems for several companies:
* Google X / Research - Localization systems ranging from embedded hardware development to lasers and holography.
* SpaceX - Avionics & flight computer software development for the Dragon spacecraft and Falcon Rocket (CRS-2)
* Amazon - Building better distributed algorithms/systems.

Interests and Background:
* Rapid prototyping & product development merging hardware/electronics/software
* Systems Engineering; Leadership in building embedded hardware/software solutions 
 (GLXP Lunar Rover Avionics team lead in Red Whitaker's Mobile Robotics course '13)
* Autonomous Multi-Vehicle Collaboration, Exploration and Navigation research sponsored by UTRC
* Quadrotor dynamics and Planning Algorithms (CMU-RI Research Project w/ Nathan Michael)
* Business focus in Lean Entrepreneurship and Consumer Research
* Motion Planning & Robotics (ROS, GNC algorithms, Computer Vision, Navigation and Intelligence etc.)
* Database & HPC services including cloud computing (Google & Amazon ecosystems), semantic networks, ontologies.

### About me
I was raised in raised in England and the USA, and have studied abroad in France. I enjoy walking on slack-lines, playing foozball, and butchering guitar, piano, and spoken French.

#### Publications / Presentations
* Spencer Rugaber, Leo Mark, Rocky Dunlap, and Sameer Ansari. "[Managing Software Complexity and Variability in Coupled Climate Models](http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/MS.2011.114)." IEEE Software (2011). Print.
* Kyel Ok, Sameer Ansari, William Gallagher, William Sica, Frank Dellaert, Mike Stilman, "[Path Planning with Uncertainty: Voronoi Uncertainty Fields](http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/ICRA.2013.6631230)." IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation 2013.
* Sameer Ansari, Rocky Dunlap. "[Automatic Configuration of CESM/CCSM4 on Amazon EC2 Cloud](http://hdl.handle.net/1853/35010).‚Äù Tech. Georgia Institute of Technology (2010). SMARTech.
* V. Balaji, Sameer Ansari, Aparna Radhakrishnan (2011), "[Challenges in Analysis and Visualization of Large Earth Science Data Sets I](http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2011AGUFMIN41C..01B)" Abstract IN41C-01 presented at 2010 Fall Meeting, AGU, San Francisco, Calif., 8 Dec.
